description: Moves a potentially malicious file to a secure quarantine directory, renames it with a timestamp, strips permissions, and restricts access to Administrators only. Generates a JSON log of the action.

script_parameters.name: TargetPath
script_parameters.description: Full path to the file that needs to be quarantined.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response JSON log path. Overwrites existing content.
